name: Ufo Hunter
description:
Game overwiew

Trying to save the world from alien invasion. Game’s audition will be 7+

Story

You are a military space agency. You have to steer the rockets.

Game Play and Mechanics

Character moves with A, D, W, S and put arrow with X

Technical

Target Hardware: Browser.

Development hardware and software: Developed on PuzzleScript.
